treatment.description: Plants annual, glabrous, glabrescent, or pubescent. Bracts not enfolding flower, not leaflike, narrowly lanceolate to subulate-linear, margins entire, plane or indistinctly undulate at margins. Pistillate flowers: tepals (4â€“)5, spatulate or obovate-elliptic, sometimes only outer tepals distinctly spatulate.
